articles.description: "At several points in the last 12 months, pubs and breweries have effectively had to pour their revenues down the drain."
articles.content:
The government's much-maligned "substantial" meal rule will reportedly be scrapped when pubs reopen after lockdown.
Boris Johnson has ordered the rules and requirements to be simplified when lockdow… [+1429 chars]
